    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String name,
      java.net.InetAddress host,
      int port)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a Client-object and tries to make a socket connection.
        Parameters:
        host - the ip-adres the client is using (can also be localhost).
        name - the username the client using.
        port - the portnumber the client wants to connect to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
